mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO at_service_box ( FID, FBillNo, FOrgID, FOrgNumber, FOrgName, FDate, FBillNoOut, FTisQty, FQty, FPrice, FTotalPrice, FCard, FMaterialID, FMaterialNumber, FMaterialName, FMaterialTypeNumber, FMaterialTypeName, FUnit, FSaleBillNo, FCreateBy, FCreateDate, FUpdateBy, FUpdateDate ) VALUES ( #{FID}, #{FBillNo}, #{FOrgID}, #{FOrgNumber}, #{FOrgName}, #{FDate}, #{FBillNoOut}, #{FTisQty}, #{FQty}, #{FPrice}, #{FTotalPrice}, #{FCard}, #{FMaterialID}, #{FMaterialNumber}, #{FMaterialName}, #{FMaterialTypeNumber}, #{FMaterialTypeName}, #{FUnit}, #{FSaleBillNo}, #{FCreateBy}, #{FCreateDate}, #{FUpdateBy}, #{FUpdateDate} )

INSERT IGNORE INTO at_service_box ( FID, FBillNo, FOrgID, FOrgNumber, FOrgName, FDate, FBillNoOut, FTisQty, FQty, FPrice, FTotalPrice, FCard, FMaterialID, FMaterialNumber, FMaterialName, FMaterialTypeNumber, FMaterialTypeName, FUnit, FSaleBillNo, FCreateBy, FCreateDate, FUpdateBy, FUpdateDate ) VALUES
( #{item.FID}, #{item.FBillNo}, #{item.FOrgID}, #{item.FOrgNumber}, #{item.FOrgName}, #{item.FDate}, #{item.FBillNoOut}, #{item.FTisQty}, #{item.FQty}, #{item.FPrice}, #{item.FTotalPrice}, #{item.FCard}, #{item.FMaterialID}, #{item.FMaterialNumber}, #{item.FMaterialName}, #{item.FMaterialTypeNumber}, #{item.FMaterialTypeName}, #{item.FUnit}, #{item.FSaleBillNo}, #{item.FCreateBy}, #{item.FCreateDate}, #{item.FUpdateBy}, #{item.FUpdateDate} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE FID = FID
